LanguageData.ShipBasics.label: basisks rumskibsbygning
LanguageData.ShipBasics.description: Gør at du kan begynde at forske i mere advancerede rumskibsbygnings teknologi og eventuelt, bygge et rumskib til at slippe væk fra planeten.
LanguageData.ShipCryptosleep.label: rumskibs cryptosøvns kiste
LanguageData.ShipCryptosleep.description: Gør at du kan konstruer ryptosøvns kister til at transporter af sovende kolonister i cryptosøvn mellem stjernerne.
LanguageData.ShipReactor.label: rumskibs ship antistofreaktor
LanguageData.ShipReactor.description: Gør at du kan bruge en antistofkontainer kerne til at bygge en fungerende antistofreaktor til at drive et rumskib.
LanguageData.ShipEngine.label: rumskibs antistofsmotor
LanguageData.ShipEngine.description: Gør at du kan bruge en antistofkontainer kerne til at bygge en fungerende antistofsmotor til et rumskib.
LanguageData.ShipComputerCore.label: rumskibs computerkerne
LanguageData.ShipComputerCore.description: Gør at du kan tvinge en eksisterende AI persona til en brugbar AI computerkerne til et rumskibs navigationsystem.

LanguageData.ShipBasics.label: starflight basics/grundlæggende rumflyvning
LanguageData.ShipBasics.description: Construct the structural and supportive elements of a starship. Dette er det første skridt i at bygge et rumskib til at forlade dette stjernesystem.
LanguageData.ShipCryptosleep.label: vacuum cryptosleep casket/
LanguageData.ShipCryptosleep.description: Construct hardened cryptosleep caskets tough enough to be exposed to vacuum, for transporting people on the years-long journey between stars.
LanguageData.ShipReactor.label: starship reactor/rumskibsreaktor
LanguageData.ShipReactor.description: Byg en langtidsholdbar kernereaktor til at drive et rumskib. Bemærk at reaktorer har en lang opstartsproces som vil tiltrække raiders.
LanguageData.ShipEngine.label: Johnson-Tanaka drive
LanguageData.ShipEngine.description: Construct a Johnson-Tanaka drive for a ship. The JT drive can push you to other stars by leveraging quantum scale effects to beam momentum to distant stars. Of course, as with all starships, it still takes many years to get anywhere.
LanguageData.ShipComputerCore.label: AI persuasion
LanguageData.ShipComputerCore.description: Build a reward-signal system to persuade an existing AI persona core into serving as a ship's AI captain. Since people sleep during interstellar travel, an AI core is necessary to handle the complex decisions of a years-long starflight.
LanguageData.ShipSensorCluster.label: rumflyvningssensorer
LanguageData.ShipSensorCluster.description: Construct long-range sensors for a starship. Disse sensorer er essentielle for at navigere, kommunikere og undgå trusler.
